name: Гель Bodyart для душа Ваниль и Апельсин 250мл
ingredients: Aqua, Sodium Laureth Sulfate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Decyl Glucoside, Sodium Chloride, Sodium Laureth Sulfate and Glycol Distearate and Cocamide MEA and Laureth-10, Coco-Glucoside and Glyceryl Oleate, Propylene Glycol, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Vanilla Planifolia Fruit Extract, Olea Europaea Leaf Extract, Benzyl Alcohol, Methylisothiazolinone, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Parfum, Disodium EDTA, Citric Acid.
